ing: 2 fluid ounces sour apple schnapps (such as DeKuyperÂ® Sour Apple Pucker)
des: "It's not tart, it's soooo smooth and sweet!"
ins: Pour the butterscotch schnapps, vodka, apple schnapps, and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled martini glass to serve.
